settings.text:
Who said you can’t do it all (and feel great the next day)? Now you can.

Rebound is a party recovery pack created by qualified nutritionists who know how to have fun. Because we believe blowing off steam  can actually be a healthy release if you look after your body properly — whether that’s a long boozy lunch, or a night on the dancefloor.

Like all good stories, Rebound was born out of personal experience. Our founder, Georgina Robertson, is a registered Nutritionist Therapist and member of BANT and CNM, and working mother of four, who firmly believes in the importance of having fun and balancing the rest of your life. And the best way to do that is be really proactive about your recovery.

She set out to develop a food supplement formula to provide everything your body needs before and after you drink or party, and leave you feeling great the next day. Rebound packs have now been used by customers for long lunches, dinnear parties, stag and hen parties, weddings, post rave recovery and festivals, with over 500 customers in the UK and rated XXx on TrustPilot. (link)
